column4: remote desktop viewer doesn't seem to work in natty. i can click around and see the background, but the menus don't pop up and it doesnt' update the screen properly
or do a fresh install.  but don't upgrade.
what part of the upgrade fails when fresh install is fine?
Well, for me, my graphics drivers are totally broken.  But it's different in every situation.  Fresh installs are just generally more headache-free.
